text.0: let vṛtraslaying indra drink soma by Śaryaṇāvāns side.
text.1: storing up vigour in his heart prepared to do heroic deeds flow indu flow for indras sake.
text.2: lord of the quarters flow thou on boon soma from arjika land.
text.3: effused with ardour and with faith and the true hymn of sacrifice flow indu flow for indras sake.
text.4: hither hath sūryas daughter brought the wild steer whom parjanya nursed.
text.5: gandharvas have seized bold of him and in the soma laid the juice flow indu flow for indras sake.
text.6: splendid by law declaring law truthspeaking truthful in thy works.
text.7: enouncing faith king soma thou o soma whom thy maker decks flow indu flow for indras sake.
text.8: together flow the meeting streams of him the great and truly strong.
text.9: the juices of the juicy meet made pure by prayer o goldenhued flow indu flow for indras sake.
text.10: o pavamana where the priest as he recites the rhythmic prayer.
text.11: lords it oer soma with the stone with soma bringing forth delight flow indu flow for indras sake.
text.12: o pavarnana place me in that deathless undecaying world.
text.13: wherein the light of heaven is set and everlasting lustre shines flow indu flow for indras sake.
text.14: make me immortal in that realm where dwells the king vivasvāns son.
text.15: where is the secret shrine of heaven where are those waters young and fresh flow indu flow for indras sake.
text.16: make me immortal in that realm where they move even as they list.
text.17: in the third sphere of inmost heaven where lucid worlds are full of light flow indu flow for indras sake.
text.18: make me immortal in that realm of eager wish and strong desire.
text.19: the region of the radiant moon where food and full delight are found flow indu flow for indras sake.
text.20: make me immortal in that realm where happiness and transports where.
text.21: joys and felicities combine and longing wishes are fulfilled flow indu flow for indras sake.
